alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains Foothills; Loving; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 31 at 9:26PM CST until January 01 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ TO 7 PM CST /6 PM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Northern Lea, Southern Lea and Central Lea Counties. In Texas, Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor, Reeves County Plains and Davis Mountains Foothills, and Loving County. * WHEN...From 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ to 7 PM CST /6 PM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing dust may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains Foothills; Loving; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
